Full directory structure, things that may be added infuture are set-off with []
Linux build directory names usually lower case.

    bin
    build -objects go here
    doc - ?? now or nextrelease doxygen APIs, pointers to website docs
    include
    src
    lib -preinstalled libraries like FTDI and built libs (.a, .so)
    <Makefile>
    <README.txt>
    [tools] scripts and source to tools/utilities
    test - test programs
    examples
    [data] - binary, ascii tables, etc.

Future Install options
- if both lynx and medusa offer linked versions (hard link files)
- lynx: server/system-wide build install target for lynx root permissions
- lynx: shared library build and install (root), target apps for shared build
